peripheralPage.template: \t/** \t * Class used to do initialisation of the $(_Class) \t * \t * This class has a templated constructor that accepts various values. \t * \t * @note This constructor may be used to create a const instance in Flash \t * \t * Example: \t * @code \t * static const $(_Class)::Init init { \t * \t * // Setup values \t * }; \t * \t * // Initialise $(_Class) from values specified above \t * $(_Class)::configure(init) \t * @endcode \t */

$(init_description) \tclass Init { \t \tpublic: \t /** \t * Copy Constructor \t */ \t constexpr Init(const Init &other) = default; \t \t /** \t * Default Constructor \t */ \t constexpr Init() = default; \t\n

\t/** \t * Configure NV from values specified in init \t * \t * @param init Class containing initialisation values \t */ \tstatic void configure(const typename Info::Init &init) { \t enable(); \t \t \t calibrate(); \t} \t \t/** \t * Configure with default settings. \t * Configuration determined from Configure.usbdmProject \t */ \tstatic inline void defaultConfigure() { \t \t // Update settings \t configure(Info::DefaultInitValue); \t}\n
